column1: 839914,Fabric and Textile Factory Worker,,"Cut fabrics, textiles, leather or hide
column7: Draw guide lines or markings on materials or work pieces using patterns or other references
column9: Operate textile or leather cutting or production equipment
column13: Move products, materials or equipment between work areas
column15: Measure materials to mark reference points, cutting lines or other indicators
column17: Construct patterns, templates or other work aids
column21: Inspect textile, hide or leather products
column23: Program equipment to perform production tasks
column25: Remove products or work pieces from production equipment
column31: Position patterns on equipment, materials or work pieces
column33: Adjust equipment controls to regulate flow of production
column35: Watch equipment in operation to detect malfunctions
column39: Notify others of equipment repair or maintenance needs
column41: Read work orders or other instructions to determine product specifications or materials requirements
column43: Feed materials or products into or through equipment
column47: Attach decorative or functional accessories to products
